NodeDetails.Comment: ![CDATA[Account Number of the Loan Account.]]
![CDATA[Branch Code of the Loan Account.]]
![CDATA[Application Number of the account.]]
![CDATA[The Customer Id of the primary applicant.]]
![CDATA[Product Code is a unique code for a product must be minimum four characters.]]
![CDATA[Product category is used to distinguish between the various loan services offered by the bank.]]
![CDATA[The user defined status for the account.]]
![CDATA[Alternate Account Number]]
![CDATA[A 16-digit User Reference Number is autogenerated and displayed based on option selected.]]
![CDATA[Customer Id of the party who provides the Subsidy for leasing.]]
![CDATA[Booking date of the loan, which cannot be modified.]]
![CDATA[Indicates valuation date of the asset.]]
![CDATA[Maturity date of the loan.]]
![CDATA[The loan currency.]]
![CDATA[Total loan amount of the loan]]
![CDATA[This indicates type of the Maturity (Fixed or Call) for loan account. F-Fixed, C-Call Type.]]
![CDATA[The actual principal amount financed. This excludes any other funded components.]]
![CDATA[Exchange rate for index currency.]]
![CDATA[The reference number of the export bill against which you want to link the loan. all active and authorized export bill contracts with non zero positive outstanding amount.]]
![CDATA[Type of the commitment account. Non Revolving-N, Revolving-R.]]
![CDATA[Specify the loan to value.]]
![CDATA[Bill Due Amount]]
![CDATA[Available amount for the commitment account.]]
![CDATA[This Flag will determine if the Rollover will be system driven or initialted by user. A-Auto, M-Manual.]]
![CDATA[This flag will determine if at the time of rollover the schedule would be defaulted from the product or from the account/Contract. P-Product,C-Contract.]]
![CDATA[This flag will determine if at the time of rollover the UDE value would be defaulted from the product or from the account /Contract. P - Product/ C- Contract.]]
![CDATA[This flag will determine the type of Rollover as Special or Custom. C-Custom, S-Special.]]
![CDATA[Capture the Special Amount that has to be rolled over for Special type of Rollover.]]
![CDATA[This determines if a Passbook can be issued to the loan account holder.]]
![CDATA[This determines if the Loan account can be accessible for ATM operations. Y/N]]
![CDATA[Indicates the Track Receivable Auto Liquidation. Y/N]]
![CDATA[Indicates the Track Receivable Manual Liquidation. Y/N]]
![CDATA[It indicates the liquidation mode of the component.]]
![CDATA[This preference determines if any feature such as interest rate , installment amount can be modified which will affect already paid schedules. Y/N]]
![CDATA[This determines if Checks or coupon books ( for disbursement ). can be written against the Loan account. Y/N]]
![CDATA[This determines if Back valued schedules can be liquidated if we book valued loan. Y/N]]
![CDATA[Indicates the Liquidity Back Valued Schedule Flag. Y/N]]
![CDATA[This determines if auto liquidation option is chosen and funds are not available, the number of times the system can retry auto liquidation. Y/N]]
![CDATA[This determines if any partial liquidation is allowed for the loan account.]]
![CDATA[This determines if auto liquidation has been reversed in an accountand it will be retries auto liquidation in the batch. Y-Yes, N-NO.]]
![CDATA[This indicates basis for automatic Rollover. M- Monthly, Q- Quaterly, H- Half Yearly, Y - Yearly.]]
![CDATA[This determines if the Rollover is allowed for the loan account. Y/N]]
![CDATA[Check this box to indicate that you have already got confirmation from the notary, before creation of the loan. Y/N(yes or no).]]
![CDATA[customer name]]
![CDATA[The Loan amount paid by the customer upfront - Owners contribution.]]
![CDATA[The Loan Value date at the time of Loan creation.]]
![CDATA[The customer Id of the primary Applicant.]]
![CDATA[Check this box to indicate that the intermediary should be initiated. Y/N(yes or no).]]
![CDATA[Specify the unique code of intermediary. The adjoining option list displays all valid codes maintained in the system. You can choose the appropriate one.]]
![CDATA[Repayment of Loans in the case of CL Accounts created with Packing Credit Product flag. Y/N(yes or no) default value is N.]]
![CDATA[Check this box to indicate that the disbursement should be stopped. Y/N(yes or no) default value is N.]]
![CDATA[Check this box to indicate that the annuity on disbursement should be recalculated. Y/N(yes or no).]]
![CDATA[This determines if bulk payment is allowed for the loan account. Y/N(yes or no).]]
![CDATA[The number of installments for the loan account.]]
![CDATA[Equated Monthly Installment Amount.]]
![CDATA[Due date (1-31) on which schedule due date should be generated.]]
![CDATA[Specify the installment schedule frequency for a loan account.]]
![CDATA[The interval in which you need to pay your installments towards the loan account created. D-Daily, M-monthly, Q-Quarterly, H-Halfyearly, Y - Yearly.]]
![CDATA[Schedule due date of the First Installment.]]

![CDATA[The payment Mode for the debit settlements (Payment). ACC- Account. ACC --> CASA CCD --> Credit Card CLG --> Clearing DCD --> Debit Card EAC --> External Account EPO --> Electronic Pay Order GIR --> GIRO ICK --> Internal Cheque INS --> Instrument TLR --> Cash/Teller]]

![CDATA[The payment Mode for the credit settlements (Disbursement). ACC- Account. ACC --> CASA CCD --> Credit Card CLG --> Clearing DCD --> Debit Card EAC --> External Account EPO --> Electronic Pay Order GIR --> GIRO ICK --> Internal Cheque INS --> Instrument TLR --> Cash/Teller]]
![CDATA[Credit settlement Product/Account.]]
![CDATA[Branch code of the credit settlement account.]]
![CDATA[The external bank code as per clearing maintenance (Credit).]]
![CDATA[The branch in of the external bank to be used for clearing (Credit).]]
![CDATA[No on the instrument presented for clearing (Credit).]]
![CDATA[The routing no for the selected branch for clearing (Credit).]]
![CDATA[The end point maintained in the clearing system will be picked up (Credit).]]
![CDATA[If the clearing is using a FLEXCUBE Clearing product then that needs to be entered (Credit).]]
![CDATA[The code of the clearing sector (Credit).]]
![CDATA[Upload Source code (Credit).]]
![CDATA[GIRO mode for automatic direct credit or manual direct credit.]]
![CDATA[The GIRO clearing system used, which can be either Bank or Plus for credit]]
![CDATA[This is applicable only for corporate customers and not for individual customers credit accounts.]]
![CDATA[The account from which the amount is paid (Credit).]]
![CDATA[The Bank code from which the amount is paid (Credit).]]
![CDATA[The Branch from which the amount is paid]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid (Credit).]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid (Credit).]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid (Credit).]]
![CDATA[Account number in the external bank (Credit).]]
![CDATA[Name of the beneficiary of the external account (Credit).]]
![CDATA[Product category for credit transactions.]]
![CDATA[Debit settlement Product/Account.]]
![CDATA[Branch code of the debit settlement account.]]
![CDATA[The account number in the external bank (Debit).]]
![CDATA[Name of the beneficiary of the external account]]
![CDATA[The external bank code as per clearing maintenance (Debit).]]
![CDATA[The branch in of the external bank to be used for clearing (Debit).]]
![CDATA[Product Category debit]]
![CDATA[No on the instrument presented for clearing (Debit).]]
![CDATA[The routing no for the selected branch for clearing (Debit).]]
![CDATA[The end point maintained in the clearing system will be picked up (Debit).]]
![CDATA[If the clearing is using a FLEXCUBE Clearing product then that needs to be entered (Debit).]]
![CDATA[The code of the clearing sector (Debit).]]
![CDATA[Upload Source code (Debit).]]
![CDATA[GIRO mode for automatic direct debit or manual direct debit. Auto, Manual.]]
![CDATA[The GIRO clearing system used, which can be either Bank or Plus for debit.]]
![CDATA[This is applicable only for corporate customers and not for individual customers debit accounts.]]
![CDATA[The account from which the amount is paid (Debit).]]
![CDATA[The Bank code from which the amount is paid (Debit).]]
![CDATA[The Branch from which the amount is paid (Debit).]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid (Debit).]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid (Debit).]]
![CDATA[Specify the address of the bank from which the amount is paid (Debit).]]
